page.title: 12MEDIA
page.content:
RADIO - Radio Oxford is the popular local station, those who like the spo- ken word tune to Radio 4. Pop music and "phone-ins" on Radio 1 is listen- ed to the young, while Radio 2 caters for all ages with a variety of enter- tainment. 3' is devoted entirely to classical music and has a minority following nationwide.
VIDEO - A new growth industry, they enable you to watch video especially made or record off your own TV. This has in turn led to video shops where tapes can be purchased or hired. Video nasties' (often pornographic) or violent are giving cause for concern.
